Package com.viper.database.dao.converters

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConverterInterface
    This interface defines the API for converter methods used/registered by the Converter class.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrayConverter  
    BeanConverter  
    BlobConverter  
    CalendarConverter  
    ClobConverter  
    Converters
    The converter class is the central conversion class which will support converting a value of one type to a value of another type.
